thread.section_title: InMyArea.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InMyArea.com | inmyarea.com | 5 of 41
thread.title: Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: My experience was really great. I was not pressured to buy anything and there was no over sale tactics. I was helped to buy the package right for me, not just pressured to buy the most expensive pacage up front. However I did decide on my own to purchase a package that was slightly higher than the sales rep offered to begin with. I was given comparisons on each service in my area so I could choose for myself.
